body_html: I read the code and didn't see any obvious history leaks. loss_history does look suspicious; if you get rid of it (or explicitly say float(loss_contrastive.data[0])) what happens? Does it OOM when you run it on CPU?
body_text: I read the code and didn't see any obvious history leaks. loss_history does look suspicious; if you get rid of it (or explicitly say float(loss_contrastive.data[0])) what happens? Does it OOM when you run it on CPU?
body: I read the code and didn't see any obvious history leaks. `loss_history` does look suspicious; if you get rid of it (or explicitly say `float(loss_contrastive.data[0])`) what happens? Does it OOM when you run it on CPU?
